name: studiedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very carefully and intentionally, rather than in a completely natural or sincere way: He made this last remark in a studiedly casual manner. The other students sat around in groups, laughing loudly and studiedly ignoring us.
More examplesFewer examplesAs a teacher and public performer, he is studiedly eccentric. For all his talk of being nervous, he seems almost studiedly relaxed.With his studiedly geeky appearance, he is the physical opposite of what most people expect.Most meeting rooms are decorated in studiedly neutral shades, and tend not to be stimulating places.
